name: Iron Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

abilities.name: Fire Absorption.
abilities.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

abilities.name: Immutable Form.
abilities.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.
